meta.title: Interactive Reports/Analytics | Aviso Coach
meta.description: Aviso Coach is an integrated AI sales coaching system to help modern sales managers create champion sales reps and teams. Aviso’s real-time performance leaderboards and purpose-built coaching rooms help leaders drive deal-specific corrective actions, and model A+ rep behavior to implement specific coaching playbooks with content and sales enablement.

content.subtitle: Aviso Coach
content.title: The only AI-based Sales Coaching Platform
content.description: Insights don’t get the best out of your sales team. Smart managers like you do. Aviso empowers sales managers to identify winning plays, transfer them across your entire team and turn every rep into a rockstar

content.title: Discover how Aviso Coach helps your reps achieve a 300% increase in close rate

items.title: The problem for Sales Managers
items.description:
• No visibility into deals. Coaching reps on commits becomes a biased debate
  • No way to ensure reps stick to your playbook and execute the right actions for very deal
  • No way to understand why top reps succeed while others fail to hit quota
  • Time-consuming to sit on entire calls/ call recordings to gauge what’s being discussed
  • Ramping new reps take way too much time
  • Difficult to produce context on coaching calls
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-6 w-6" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M19 20H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h10a2 2 0 012 2v1m2 13a2 2 0 01-2-2V7m2 13a2 2 0 002-2V9a2 2 0 00-2-2h-2m-4-3H9M7 16h6M7 8h6v4H7V8z" /></svg>

items.title: The Aviso Coach Solution
items.description:
• AI gives unbiased answers to which deals to pull in and out of commits
  • Understand the true nature of rep-buyer relationships in every deal
  • NLP-based insights show what top reps do on every call
  • Smart Summaries help you quickly understand how discussions truly went and next steps
  • Boost ramp times by 35% through ‘sales cloning’
  • Use context-driven spaces to conduct meetings
items.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-6 w-6" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 21a4 4 0 01-4-4V5a2 2 0 012-2h4a2 2 0 012 2v12a4 4 0 01-4 4zm0 0h12a2 2 0 002-2v-4a2 2 0 00-2-2h-2.343M11 7.343l1.657-1.657a2 2 0 012.828 0l2.829 2.829a2 2 0 010 2.828l-8.486 8.485M7 17h.01" /></svg>

content.subtitle: NETAPP
content.title: Aviso helped us find areas where the objection was because a prospect was confused. It created an opportunity to educate the customer or partner and eliminate that objection in the future
content.description: Lori Harmon, VP Digital Virtual Sales

logo.label: Aviso Coach

content.subtitle: REP FORECASTING
content.title: Hit the forecast on the head
content.description: No more flying blind. Know which deals are winnable or at-risk. Aviso uncovers hidden pipeline insights that sidestep rep bias and deliver a 98% forecasting accuracy.

items.description: Time Series AI Engine continuously integrates data from every customer touchpoint and past pipeline

items.description: Know the real status of every rep’s pipe and coach effectively to close the gaps

content.subtitle: SALES CLONING
content.title: Roger, copy that!
content.description: Why does Jason crush quota every quarter while Roger lags on the leaderboard? Don’t guess. Identify and clone winning sales behaviors across your entire team.

items.description: Get the gist of critical items discussed, questions raised and next steps through AI generated smart transcriptions

content.subtitle: LEADERBOARDS
content.title: Play together. Win together
content.description: Measure reps based on any metric you need. Celebrate your quota-hitters. Train the rest with AI-driven insights. Build a sales culture that wins, quarter after quarter

items.description: Know who your leading and lagging reps are with Scorecards. Analyze your top reps to coach your low performers

items.title: - Charles Forsgard
items.subtitle: VP Sales, Honeywell
items.description: Aviso Conversational Intelligence (CI) gives insights right to the seller and at the same time, it gives insights to me (the sales leader) on what I should really be coaching the seller on right now, in their pipeline

items.title: - Brian Gumbel
items.subtitle: CRO at Armis
items.description: Under Trevor's leadership, Aviso will become the global standard for organizations and CROs. Such an incredible and easy to use platform!

items.title: - Lori Harmon
items.subtitle: VP Digital Virtual Sales, NetApp
items.description: I was sold on Aviso and Trevor's vision in my first demo. There is no other platform on the market with such rich functionality. The competition tends to be point solutions that add up to a higher TCO and require separate integrations, eating up the time of your IT team
